actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5 of the United States Code to clarify certain exemptions from its disclosure requirements, to provide guidelines and limitations for the classification of information.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Freedom of Information Act Amendments - Authorizes the President and heads of specified Federal agencies to classify as "Secret Defense Data" any official information or material acquired by them, the unauthorized disclosure of which may reasonably be expected to cause damage to the national defense. Provides procedures for the automatic declassification of such official information or material.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5 of the United States Code to clarify certain exemptions from its disclosure requirements, to provide guidelines and limitations for the classification of information.
